summary: Translates a GeoDataFrame that defines a single‑layer horizontal flow barrier with associated multipliers into the MODFLOW‑6 HFB package input, handling geometry processing, variable naming, and barrier value computation.
business_intent: Allow groundwater modelers to easily incorporate spatially varying flow resistance across a horizontal barrier in a single‑layer MODFLOW‑6 model, streamlining the creation of correct HFB package inputs.
